title: Fix analyze.js to use package directory paths
description: analyze.js runs 'node transformer.js' etc. from cwd instead of from the package directory. This causes MODULE_NOT_FOUND errors when running from other projects. Need to use __dirname to resolve script paths.
close_reason: Fixed - scripts now use __dirname to resolve paths

title: Add tree-sitter parsers for ClojureScript and Janet
description: Install and configure tree-sitter-clojure and create/find tree-sitter-janet parser to support these languages.

title: Add smart default ignore patterns
description: Even without .gitignore, exclude common patterns: node_modules/, dist/, build/, target/, .shadow-cljs/, vendor/, venv/, __pycache__/, .git/

title: Add language detection before analysis
description: Scan project to detect primary languages (by counting file extensions). Report findings and warn if unsupported languages detected before running full analysis.

title: Respect .gitignore to exclude build artifacts and dependencies
description: Tool currently analyzes dist/, node_modules/, .shadow-cljs/ which are build artifacts. Should parse .gitignore and exclude those patterns by default.
